title: mOsam pOghalAmO
sahitya:
mOsam pOghalAmO mati manamE nI vIsu pugazh vElavan dAsan AghAmal mati


anupallavi

  kAsini idanilE kAsu paNam adanilE karuttai izhandu varuttum mighundu


caraNam    nAsham aDuttiDAda nallAshaiyODu nI nADuvadellAm kai kUDuvadODu ini
shAsvatamAna sukha vAsap-pEru peravE mAsillA murugan mahimai pEshiDAmal
